transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Sir Aakib ji baat kar rahe hain diamond Vishwas se.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji sir ji.
Executive: Aakib ji very good evening Pravesh baat kar raha tha India Mart se office Noida se.
Customer: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Sir aapka na sir concern kuch hua tha related to services thoda mujhe batayenge sir kya problem face kar rahe the aap?
Customer: Sir problem kya problem hi problem hai.
Customer: Mujhe to bilkul bhi acha nahi lagta kisi ko bar bar call karke pareshan karna sir aap ek aap mujhe ek baat bataye insan paise lagata hai business ke liye kis liye lagata hai sir?
Executive: Sir bilkul business badhane ke liye lagata hai.
Customer: Business badhane ke liye lagata hai na sir chahe wo insan ek rupya lagaye ya ek crore rupya lagaye.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai jab se maine sir ye plan liya hai na aap yakin karna aap meri profile khud le lo main 5000 sir sab de dunga usme jitne bhi abhi tak leads aayi hai jinse maine baat ki hai abhi tak bhi ek bhi customer aisa nahi tha jo mujhse matlab locker lene wala ho jyada se jyada usme kya hoti hai inquiry wali.
Customer: Theek hai aur dusri baat kabhi kabhi aisa bhi hota number hi off aate.
Executive: Nahi sir aapne around 50 around aapne 70 by lead use kari hai 70 abhi tak.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Matlab jab se aapki service live hui hai 72 73 ke kareeb to 72 73 mein sir aapki kisi se baat bhi nahi hui kisi customer se baat bhi nahi hui.
Customer: Baat sabse hui hai baat hone ke baad hum bolte ki hum to check kar rahe the hum dekh rahe the abhi nahi lenge kuch din baad lenge matlab yahi hai ki nahi lene wali baaten hoti hai.
Executive: Sir readymade customer to sir aap bhi bataye kahin pe bhi nahi milte aap baat karenge aap agar 70 customer se connect kar rahe hain teen char customer to nikle hue hain yahan quotation aapne bheja hoga aapke pass.
Customer: Baat sir customer ki nahi hai baat ye hai ki jo customers hai inke inquiry wale nahi hone chahiye ye hona chahiye ki ha 100% 100% bhi nahi kam se kam 80% ye to hona chahiye ki ha certified hai ha lene hi wale hai.
Executive: Sir actually kya hota hai jo aapki aapka jo product kaisa hai aapka product kaise 1000 2000 wala product nahi hai jisko lena hoga sir wo ek bar inquiry char logo se puchega tab ja ke confirm karta hai.
Customer: Bilkul baat sir baat aapki theek aapki baat theek hai sir main ye business samti panch saal se kar raha hu sir theek hai main marketing kar sakta hu matlab marketing me le jata jab se ye online apps aaye to maine socha maine pehle bhi kiya tha ye kam India Mart se pehle acha response aaya tha ab se ek saal pehle.
Executive: Sir abhi to service start hui hai main to ye keh raha hu sir abhi to aapki just service start hi hui hai.
Customer: To aap itni jaldi lenge main bhi to aap se yahi keh raha hu service starting mein to acha dikhna chahiye na.
Executive: Sir aap ek cheez mujhe bataye sir dekhiye main aapko sir itna acha customer de jo aap se bahut ache se baat kar raha bol raha main kal lunga parso lunga but jab tak wo aapko payment nahi karega aapko wo genuine nahi lagega.
Customer: Sir ye payment ki to baat ye rahi payment to payment to tabhi hota hai jab hamara delivery mal unke paas pahunch jata hai na.
Customer: Delivery tabhi tabhi hota hai sir.
Executive: Sir aap aap sir ek saal ki aap service le rahe ho itni jaldi aap mindset bana lenge ki mere ko yahan pe business nahi milne wala to.
Customer: Are yahi to aap se keh raha hu one month one month se upar ho gaya kam se kam ek customer to certified hota nahi hota.
Executive: Bilkul aapki baat samajh raha hu but but main ye cheez keh raha hu sir aap se ki matlab aap aap sir ek cheez customer aap jab baat karte hain to mahange product mein sir jinki costing high hoti hai aapka high value product mein aata hai sir.
Customer: Aapki achi baat kar rahe ho main apne yakin karna main apne ads chalata hu insta aur FB par ads chalata hu to usme wo to apne upar run karta hai kitne log dekh pa kitne us hisab se paise karte ek din ke hafte ke jaise.
Executive: FB se jo customer aapke paas aata hai wo aapko leta hi leta hai matlab.
Customer: Main wahi baat wahi baat main aapko samjha raha hu ki main suppose kijiye ki aaj maine ads chalaya teen din ke liye theek hai usme karte 7 se 800 theek hai to teen din mein se ek customer hume aisa mil jayega ki wo usko leni hi leni hoti hai.
Customer: Customer aisa nahi ki ek hi aata din mein customer kam se kam 15 se 20 customer ke call message aate theek hai to usme se teen din tak ek customer certified ho jata jisse hum locker de paate.
Customer: To itna sir hona chahiye ki hafte mein ek bar to sir ek customer to sir hafte mein se milna chahiye na jo main aapki baat samajh raha hu but sir business convert kahin na kahin agar aap dekhenge to kafi chezo pe depend karta hai sir kabhi kabhar hum ye bhi dekhte hain ki matlab samne wale ko quotation samne wale ka samajh aaya nahi aaya sir dekhiye B to B platform hai quotation ki baat quotation ke baat kar rahe sir main ji aap boliye sir.
Customer: Main ye keh raha hu sir hum to matlab jab aap starting de rahe hote hum to sir maturity ki matlab shority dete hum to kehte hum aapko lead pahuncha denge.
Customer: Abhi beech mein abhi beech mein mujhse ek baat boli gayi thi 10 se jan tak shayad 10 12 din ho gaye honge ki aapne plan dusra wala le rakha hai aapko plan lena chahiye tha 55000 wala to maine unse pucha 55000 wala kon sa plan hai mujhe to iske bare mein kuch nahi bataya gaya.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ye kya hai sir?
Executive: Nahi plan sir dekhiye plan to hamare sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm ji ji aap boliye aap boliye aap kuch keh rahe.
Customer: Agar mujhe pehle plan ye bataya hota 50000 55000 wala bhi hai ya 80000 wala bhi hai sir main wo karta mujhe iske bare mein kuch nahi bataya jo maine plan liya hai na isi ke bare mein mujhe pata hai aur isi ke bare mein mujhe samjhaya.
Executive: Aakib sir matlab plan to sir hamare 15 lakh tak jate hain sir annual.
Customer: Sir wo to mujhe bhi pata hai 15 se kya 50 50 lakh ke aapke plan jate hain sir.
Executive: Wo to business ke upar depend karta hai na.
Customer: Hmm hmm main wahi keh raha hu sir ki hum starting mein customer ko hum nahi chahte ki hum kisi ko 10 lakh ka plan de wo bhi wo something samajhne mein teen char lakh ka time lagaye.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi isme 10 lakh isme 10 lakh ki baat nahi ho rahi isme to 37 se leke 55000 tak ki baat ho rahi hai na sir jo insan 37000 de sakta hai.
Executive: Matlab main ye example de raha hu sir ki hum company mein ye rule kar rakha hai aap bilkul basic dijiye pehle taki customer samajh paye services ko uske baad jab unko benefit ho fir wo aage badhe.
Customer: Baat aapki theek hai main India Mart chala chuka hu ab se saal de saal pehle lekin us time khud ki GST nahi thi main chahta ki khud ki GST thi usse to maine apni aapki nayi GST li GST lene ke baad sabse pehle main India Mart chalu kiya kyu kiya kyuki mujhe pata hai ki India Mart mein business acha hai isliye to kiya sir maine.
Executive: Commercial product hai aapka bas matlab aapke mindset yahi hai sir ki jaise meri baat matlab jitne bhi baat ho aap khud dekhiye aap meri profile khud check kijiye usme jyada se jyada kya hai do feet do feet sir agar leads aa bhi rahi hai to do feet se jyada kyu nahi do feet se main kya hota sir usme main apna labor charge ya transport charge nikalunga wo main khud apna nikalunga sir.
Customer: To by ho ja ke do do feet ki bhi honi chahiye char feet ki bhi panch feet ki bhi feet ki bhi saat feet ki bhi abhi tak char do teen feet se lekar saat feet tak ki ek bhi leads nahi hai abhi tak ho sakta hai wo mere dhyan mein nahi hai.
Executive: Dekhiye abhi tak do feet ki nahi hai aisa nahi hai ki pure din do feet ki ek bhi aapko panch feet ya feet ki ek bhi lead nahi mili hogi Aakib ji lekin main hogi lekin mere khayal se abhi tak do se do feet do feet do feet.
Executive: Sir main bas aap se itna kehna chahta hu sir hum to business ki shurity kabhi dete bhi nahi sir hum to hamesha yahi bolte hain ki matlab hum aapko lead tak la ke denge agar aapne hamara plan bhi liya hoga.
Customer: Mera maksad bilkul bhi refund lene ka nahi hai.
Customer: Mera maksad hai apne business aage badhane ka sir.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul main ek rupya bhi wapas aap se kabhi bhi nahi bolunga agar mera business theek se chalta hai leads ache se aati rahi main to aur bada plan karaunga fir sir.
Customer: In karaunga sab aap khud bataye.
Executive: GST GST verified lead jyada use kariye na sir matlab jo GST verified lead aati hai jaise main aapka abhi tak ka jo aapne by lead consumption kara hai jo maine abhi matlab aapka dekha to main aapko do cheeze bolunga sir even though aap properly har cheez utha rahe hain but lead hamara jo lead manager karke option hota hai ab aapne sari lead use kari hai sir takriban 80 aur aapne call mila hai sirf 13 14 customer ko India Mart ki app ke through aap
Customer: Udhar se to ek bhi leads aati nahi hai agar main check kar leta hu lead isme show karti hai ek bhi ek bhi bar aise na customer ki call mere pass aayi ho.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.

- Leads are mostly inquiries, not potential buyers.

- Feels bothered by repeatedly calling customers.

- Believes the service should show better results.

- Was not informed about higher-value subscription plans.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the nature of the product.

- Executive suggested using GST verified leads.

- Executive clarified the company does not guarantee business.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, gst, refund, customer satisfaction
